title: Rubio Says Trump to Move On From Ukraine Peace Talks if No Progress Soon
summary: Senator Marco Rubio indicated that Donald Trump would abandon Ukraine peace negotiations if substantial progress isn't made quickly, according to reports.
content:
A news report indicates that Senator Marco Rubio has commented on former President Donald Trump's potential approach to Ukraine peace negotiations. According to Rubio, Trump would likely abandon peace talks between Ukraine and Russia if significant progress isn't achieved in the near future.

This statement comes amid ongoing discussions about U.S. foreign policy regarding the Russia-Ukraine conflict and its future direction under potential different administrations.

source.title: Rubio Says Trump to ‘Move On’ From Ukraine Peace Talks if No Progress Soon

content.title: nytimes.com
content.content: Please enable JS and disable any ad blocker
